mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_num, member_id, member_password, member_name, member_phone ) VALUES ( member_num_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone} )
mapper.select: SELECT item_num ,item_name ,item_price ,item_image ,item_info ,item_status FROM item WHERE member_num = ${mno}
SELECT member_num ,member_id ,member_password ,member_name ,member_phone ,member_score ,account_num FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_password = #{memberPassword}
SELECT member_num ,member_id ,member_password ,member_name ,member_phone ,member_score ,account_num FROM member WHERE member_num = #{mno}
SELECT m.member_num ,m.member_score ,i.item_name ,i.item_num ,i.item_image ,i.item_status ,i.item_price FROM member m JOIN item i ON m.member_num = i.member_num WHERE m.member_num = ${memberNum}
